metadata.title: Malaria from hyperendemicity to elimination in Hekou County on China- Vietnam border: an ecological study

abstract.original_text: Background: Malaria control and elimination are challenged by diversity and complexity of the determinants on the international border in the Great Mekong Sub-region. Hekou, a Chinese county on the China-Vietnam border, was used to document Chinese experiences and lessons for malaria control and elimination.

sentences.segment_text: Background : Malaria control and elimination are challenged by diversity and complexity of the determinants on the international border in the Great Mekong Sub-region .
Hekou , a Chinese county on the China-Vietnam border ,
was used to document Chinese experiences and lessons for malaria control and elimination .
